metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42119 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
[Exim dnsdb Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-base - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-config - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-daemon-light - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
eximon4 - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exim4 package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.96-14ubuntu1.3').
